sense.def: Alternative Names miao jing chuang 貓睛瘡 , cat eyes sores; miao yan jing chuang 貓眼睛瘡. Pathological Condition of sores on body and face with luster but without pus and blood, irregular episodes of pain and itching, and a lack of appetite. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 10: 面上及遍身 生瘡似貓兒眼，有光彩，無膿血，但痛癢不常，飲食減少，冬則遍脛， 名曰寒瘡 , “The entire body and the face develop sores reminiscent of cat eyes. They have luster but no pus or blood. They ache and itch in irregular intervals, and [patients] drink and eat less and less. In winter they cover the entire shins. This is called ‘ cold sores ’”. Han hou 寒齁 , cold snore [3]
Pathological Condition of hou 齁 , snore, brought forth by cold evil. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：石胡荽，寒齁擂酒服 , “ Shi hu sui , for cold snore pound and ingest with wine”.
